sentences.sContent: As evolution continues, the time eventually will come when he will be able to create directly by the word emitted from his spiritualized larynx.
sentences.sContent_eng: As evolution continues, the time eventually will come when he will be able to create directly by the word emitted from his spiritualized larynx.
sentences.sCn: 随着进化的继续，当他能够通过他精神化了的喉头发出的语言直接进行创造的时候，这个时代最重就要到来了。

trans.tranOther: the part in your throat where your voice is produced
